article.headline: Brown 80, Harvard 68
article.story: BOSTON (AP) --Brian Cusworth scored 19 points and Matt Stehle added 16 points and 13 rebounds Saturday in Harvard's 80-68 win over Brown. The Bears (10-15, 3-8 Ivy) were led by Jason Forte with 23 points. Sam Manhanga scored 16 while Marcus Becker had 12 and Luke Ruscoe 11. Harvard (12-13, 7-5) got 10 points from Cusworth in the first half as the Crimson led 33-26 at halftime. Brown went on a 13-2 run early in the second half and closed the lead to 41-39 with 15:51 left. But the Crimson responded with a 13-6 run and took a 54-45 lead on a Cusworth jump shot with 12:09 remaining. The Bears staged one final run in the last three minutes of the game, outscoring the Crimson 7-1 and cutting the Harvard lead to 72-67 on two Sam Manhanga free throws with 1:28 left. But Harvard made all six of its foul shots down the stretch and Cusworth added a dunk to seal the win.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
